alert.note: Alert for Divide (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN DIVIDE COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Alkabo to near Fortuna to Writing Rock State Historical Site. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of western Divide County, including the following locations... Ambrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern North Dakota.
